keyMoments.title: Banquet with Luffy
keyMoments.description: The Kuja Pirates hold a banquet where Luffy entertains them with his Gomu Gomu no Haragi technique.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the integration of Luffy into Kuja society before his departure.

keyMoments.title: Yuda Transportation Explained
keyMoments.description: The episode shows how the Kuja Pirates use poisonous Yuda sea serpents to pull their ship through the Calm Belt, as even Sea Kings fear the Yuda.
keyMoments.significance: Explains the unique method by which the Kuja traverse the dangerous Calm Belt.

keyMoments.title: Target of Marine Offensive
keyMoments.description: The Marines announce an all-out offensive against the Whitebeard Pirates, summoning all Seven Warlords of the Sea for the battle.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the impending Summit War at Marineford.

keyMoments.title: Ace's Execution as Bait
keyMoments.description: The Marines plan to execute Portgas D. Ace, a Whitebeard Pirates division commander, to lure Whitebeard into a trap.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the Marines' strategy to draw out and defeat Whitebeard.
